definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: In general, this is even better news for developers.
sentences.chinese: 大体上，这对于开发者来说是件好事。

sentences.english: The image above shows the general outline of a fixed-width website layout.
sentences.chinese: 上图显示了固定宽度网页布局大体上的实现方式。

sentences.english: And the femur of course carries the body, to a large extent.
sentences.chinese: 股骨大体上，支撑着它的身体。

sentences.english: On balance, dress designing appeals to me most.
sentences.chinese: 大体上说，我最喜欢服装设计。
大体上纽约有三重属性。

sentences.english: Dark energy basically works against gravity in a tug-of-war.
sentences.chinese: 大体上，暗能量在与引力展开一场拉锯战。

sentences.english: Last year both India and Nigeria had substantially fewer cases than ever before.
sentences.chinese: 去年，印度和尼日利亚都比以前大体上没有增加病例。
但税率大体上还是保持在较低水平。

sentences.english: But on a whole, colonialism for the entire continent lasted only so long.
sentences.chinese: 但大体上整个大陆殖民政策的持续时间还是相当长的。

sentences.english: Grossly, the tumors are poorly circumscribed, gray-white, and may have flecks of calcification.
sentences.chinese: 大体上，肿瘤边界不清，灰白色，可见钙化点。

sentences.english: There is also a tendency that the absolute value of mean hypocenter depth increases with magnitude by and large.
sentences.chinese: 震源深度均值大体上也有随震级增大而增大的趋势。

sentences.english: Marriage mostly was for security and lineage.
sentences.chinese: 婚姻大体上是为了保险和繁衍。

sentences.english: After that, I find I am mainly relieved.
sentences.chinese: 之后，我发现自己大体上是解脱了。

sentences.english: The pathological change generally presented dose response relation to the water iodine.
sentences.chinese: 病理改变大体上与水碘呈剂量反应关系。

sentences.english: Up to the later period of the Northern and Southern Dynasty, stone-working skills were almost the same as what they are in modem times.
sentences.chinese: 到南北朝后期，石作技术与工艺大体上已与近世相近。

sentences.english: In the case of Cepheus, the tip of the roof (a star known as Gamma Cephei, or Er Rai) points generally northward.
sentences.chinese: 就仙王座来说，房顶的尖端大体上指向南方。
